name: Ifritgram
description: A powerful multi-featured userbot on Telegram.

string_session.description: Collect this value by executing python3 string_session.py

ifritgram_gallery.description: Enter a Chat ID where your Self-Destruct Media will be stored.

bot_token.description: A bot token is required to create inline buttons; go to @BotFather to create a bot to get a bot token.

owner.description: The owner's user ID is required to verify the owner and give access to various features.

assistant_bot.description: Enter the username of the bot you have created, with the help of which the help menu will be created.
